title: CrawlingCowsMoo
author: CrawlingCowsMoo
content: I bought a $20 Bitcoin gift card from them after I had an incredibly easy time buying one maybe an hour before. Can't get card and pin info and then they banned my account. Can someone tell me a way to bypass this shit and get my damn info haha

comments.author: FinneysTrueVision
comments.body: You should contact their support according to their FAQ. They’re a shady website who doesn’t seem to care about their reputation so there is no guarantee they will actually give you proper assistance and help resolve your problem.
